Html:
Hello,

I had installed my 1st Windows 10 in my domain.
The update settings (servername, certificate, ...) ist assigned by GPO to that machine, same GPO i use for all the other clients (Win 7), and the Win10 installs the Microsoft updates.

Only the own packages created by WPP always fail with error 0x80246003.
My win7 machines installes same applications without any errors.

Is the WPP not able to handle Win10?

BTW: Forgive my lousy english

Edit: Both clients are x64, DC and WSUS Server is 2008R2, WSUS 3 SP2

Regards

eggat

There are no problem with WPP handle W10.

It looks like a configuration pbroblem. Or maybee this troubleshooting will help you:
http://blogs.itacs.de/HS/Lists/Beitraege/Post.aspx?ID=79
